translation: He who abandons action out of fear of bodily trouble (because it is painful), does not obtain the merit of renunciation by performing such Rajasic renunciation.
commentary: 18.8 suffering (it is) painful? It is thus? Eve even? that which? Karma action? from fear of bodily trouble? Leave abandons? He he? Performing by doing? Rajasam Rajasic? Tyagam abandonment? Not not? Eve even? Tyagaphalam the fruit of abandonment? Labhet obtains.Commentary Phalam Fruit or reward Moksha or emancipation which is the reward of renunciation of all actions accompanied with wisdom.Determination
